headline: General Dynamics Balances AI Army Work With Prospective Navy Submarine Windfall
summary: General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) is working with Safe Pro Group to showcase AI-powered mission systems for the U.S. Army, integrating Safe Pro AI capabilities into its GeoSuite platform. The company is also moving forward on a potential multibillion US Navy submarine contract that could reshape its marine segment portfolio. For you as an investor, these updates sit at the intersection of AI adoption and traditional defense programs. NYSE:GD already spans combat systems, IT, aerospace, and marine...
